title: FTA with Israel in two phases, focus on low-hanging fruit
description:

title: India, Israel agree on terms for FTA, aims 10-fold rise in trade
description:

title: Israel Economy Shrinks by One-Fifth in Final Quarter Due to Gaza War

title: Israel's composite state of the economy index increased 0.6 per cent in January

title: Latest politics news and top stories
Israel’s Inflation Surges, Outpaces Analyst Expectations
description:
Israel’s inflation rate for the month showed a significant increase, rising to 0.5% from the previous month’s -0.6%. This marks a 1.1 percentage point shift, indicating a reversal from deflationary conditions to inflationary pressures.

title: Tanker, insurance rates unmoved by Israel-Iran conflict
description: NEW DELHI: Tanker and insurance rates have remained unmoved as oil continues to flow amid simmering geopolitical tension between Israel and Iran as fear of a wider conflagration engulfing West Asia recede, sources privy to discussions during a review meeting of oil company executives on Friday said....

title: Bank of Israel cuts interest rate to 4.25% for first time in nearly two years
description: Tel Aviv [Israel], November 25 (ANI/TPS): After nearly two years, the Bank of Israel lowered its interest rate, cutting it by a quarter of a percentage point to 4.25 per cent on Monday. This marks the first reduction since January 2024, ending a stretch of 14 consecutive decisions in which the rate ...

title: Bank of Israel Lowers Interest Rates Amid Ceasefire's Impact
description: The Bank of Israel has taken a significant step by lowering its short-term interest rates by a quarter-point, marking the first reduction in nearly two years. This decision, announced on Monday, comes in the wake of a ceasefire in Gaza that has led to easing inflation and reduced geopolitical risks....

title: Jobs up, unemployment up: What the new numbers mean for your wallet
description: Americans for Tax Reform President Grover Norquist analyzes the September jobs report showing 119,000 jobs added and a 4.4% unemployment rate and discusses the Trump administration's plans to address economic challenges.
